OOC: Yeah, you're right. This is my last topic discussion piece about facti=
on bashing over the RPG. I'd just like to say that my Chivtrons are indeed =
weak, but that's because I wanted them that way. I'm not bashing any factio=
ns. Burning Hammer is in a weakened state, but Arrow is a very good fighter=
, no matter what happens. Just so you know I'm not against the Chivtrons, I=
 am adding a new bad ass character to the Chivtrons very soon. Right after =
Sarge dies, in fact, I will start him up. I apologize for all whom I have c=
onfused...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 01, 2001 6:34 AM
  Subject: Re: Dea=
r owners of the Cybers...


  don't say it Soulstice, wait till it happens =
then DO it, thats why it's called Roll Playing.


    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sen=
t: Saturday, June 30, 2001 7:22 PM
    Subject: Re: Dear owners of the Cybe=
rs...


    OOC: Okay, I'm sorry, but it's the truth. My characters could n=
ot co-exist in the same faction like that, ad then what? Make them act unre=
alistic? To keep them in character of course the Mafia would attack the Chi=
vtrons, and then  who would I have die? As much as I like them, my Chivtron=
s would end up dying. It's not a threat, honest, I'm just pointing out what=
 would really happen. Sorry if you took it as a threat...

      ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
      From: Yanshosh@... 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 10:24 PM
      Subject: Re: De=
ar owners of the Cybers...


      If anyone continues to post on the subje=
ct of factions and stuff OOC, I'll have rAuq kneecap them. Now, for the (ho=
pefully) final commant on this:

      First of all: Soulstice, that was ju=
st plain cheap. Its threats like those that make people not want people's c=
hars in their faction. "If you do this, I'll kill off my chars on your side=
" is exactly what makes faction commanders begin to rely on your chars less=
 and less, resulting in them being ignored.

      Second of all: as Gunthe=
rs said, quit trying to predict what the Alliance is gonna do. You're all w=
rong so far anyways.



      --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecod=
e@p...> wrote:
      > OOC: I did a poll. Want to vote in it? All I'm sayin=
g is that if there is an alliance, all of my Chivtrons are going to die. I =
didn't really want that, though...

ps is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/

o! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
